text: musaykkum addehattinre saheadarannum nam iprakaram sandesam nalki: ninnal rantuperum ninnalute alukalkk venti ijiptil (pratyekam) vitukal sekaryappetuttukayum, ninnalute vitukal khiblayakkukayum, ninnal namaskaram murapeale nirvahikkukayum ceyyuka. satyavisvasikalkk ni santeasavartta ariyikkuka
